name: @mulekick/file-streamer
description: Perform continous reads on a file or named pipe, push the data into a readable stream.

scripts.postpublish: git add . && git commit -m "$npm_package_name: version $npm_package_version published on $(date +%F\ %r)" && git push -u origin master

author: mulekick <moolekick@gmail.com> (https://github.com/mulekick)
